mapper.sql: SELECT claim_no, claim_title, claim_content, claim_type, user_id, user_emailID, user_emailDomain, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_phone3, to_char(claim_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as claim_date, claim_store, file_type, view_cnt, to_char(reg_at, 'yy-mm-dd') as reg_at FROM t_claim
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_t_claim_no.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO t_claim(claim_no, claim_title, claim_content, claim_type, user_id, user_emailID, user_emailDomain, user_phone1, user_phone2, user_phone3, claim_date, claim_store, file_type) VALUES(#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{file, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer}, #{emailID}, #{emailDomain}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{visitDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{visitStore, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileOX})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_claim SET claim_title = #{title}, claim_content = #{content}, claim_type = #{type}, user_emailID = #{emailID}, user_emailDomain = #{emailDomain}, user_phone1 = #{phone1}, user_phone2 = #{phone2}, user_phone3 = #{phone3}, claim_date = #{visitDate}, claim_store = #{visitStore}, file_type = #{fileOX}, reg_at = #{regDate} WHERE claim_no = #{no}
mapper.select: where user_id = #{id} ORDER BY claim_no DESC
